1344160.name: Simply Puzzles: Codewords Demo
1344160.description:
Simply Puzzles: Codewords features 100 handmade codewords, presented in a simple, clean format.
This demo allows you to try 2 full codewords from the game.

Each letter of the alphabet has a number - figure out which number and fill the grid.

The full game has:
  • 100 handcrafted codewords
  • Relaxing, meditative presentation designed to help you focus
  • Steam achievements
  • Cloud saves

No distractions, no fuss - simply codewords.
